import React from 'react'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import ButtonGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ButtonGroup' import DropdownButton from 'react-bootstrap/DropdownButton' import Dropdown from 'react-bootstrap/Dropdown' import './App.css'; class App extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = {render:"word", side:"Front", front:"", back:""}; } render() { return
{this.renderSwitch()}
} renderSwitch() { switch(this.state.render) { case "study": return this.renderStudy() case "deck": return this.renderDeck() case "word": return this.renderWord() case "select": return this.renderSelect() default: return

error

} } renderStudy() { return <>

Study

} renderDeck() { return <>

Make a new Deck

Enter the title of your Deck

{ e.preventDefault(); this.setState({render: "word"}) }} >
} renderWord() { return <>

Add a Card

{e.preventDefault(); alert("The entered text is stored on the "+ this.state.side.toLowerCase()+" of the metaphorical card. NOTE: the text field does not change right now but would change to reflect what the user typed.")} } width="300px"> alert(Object.keys(e.target))} placeholder={this.state.side + " of Card"} />
} renderSelect(){ return <>

Choose the Subject

alert("The list of decks is filtered by the search term, case-independant")} >

} } export default App;
